original: @74a * // rgya gar skad du /🔽ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti n'i l'am pa ra dha ra badzra p'a ni ga ru da s'a dha nam /
analyzed: @74a * // rgya gar skad du / ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti n'i l'am pa ra dha ra badzra p'a ni ga ru da s'a dha nam /
translated: In Sanskrit:🔽Mahāyakṣasenāpatinīlāmbaradharavajrapāṇigaruḍasādhana🔽

original: bod skad du /🔽gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang / bya khyung gi sgrub thabs /🔽dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud dang ni //🔽gser mig 'khyil ba'i rgyud dag la //
analyzed: bod skad du / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang / bya khyung gi sgrub thabs / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo // rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud dang ni // gser mig 'khyil ba'i rgyud dag la //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: brten nas nang gi sgrub thabs 'di //🔽bdag gis dran phyir bshad par bya //🔽lha yi rnal 'byor yud tsam bsam //🔽rang gi snying gar zla dkyil bsam //🔽de yi steng du h'um yig bsam //🔽h'um las 'od zer 'phros pa yis //🔽phyi nang gsal nas 'od zer 'phros //🔽bla ma dang ni gos sngon can //🔽dkon mchog la sogs spyan drangs nas //
analyzed: brten nas nang gi sgrub thabs 'di //🔽bdag gis dran phyir bshad par bya //🔽lha yi rnal 'byor yud tsam bsam //🔽rang gi snying gar zla dkyil bsam //🔽de yi steng du h'um yig bsam //🔽h'um las 'od zer 'phros pa yis //🔽phyi nang gsal nas 'od zer 'phros //🔽bla ma dang ni gos sngon can //🔽dkon mchog la sogs spyan drangs nas //

original: phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang // rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang // rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol //
translated: rejoicing, requesting, and supplicating.

original: skyabs 'gro lus dbul dge rtsa ba ngo //
analyzed: skyabs 'gro lus dbul dge rtsa ba ngo //
translated: Going for refuge, offering the body, and the roots of virtue.

original: tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya //
analyzed: tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya //
translated: Also meditate on the four immeasurables.

original: de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom //
analyzed: de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom //
translated: Then meditate on the concentration of emptiness.

original: de na 'od dpung tshul du bdag / de yi nang du h'um gnas pa //
analyzed: de na 'od dpung tshul du bdag / de yi nang du h'um gnas pa //
translated: Within that, like a mass of light,

original: de las dza: 'phros 'khor lor gyur //
analyzed: de las dza: 'phros 'khor lor gyur //
translated: there is a hūṃ, from which a jheṃ emanates and becomes a wheel.

original: lte bar nyi bsam h'um de nyid //
analyzed: lte bar nyi bsam h'um de nyid //
translated: In the center, imagine a sun and that hūṃ.

original: de nas gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur //
analyzed: de nas gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur //
translated: Then it becomes the king of Sumbha.

original: thugs ka'i h'um gyi 'phro du las //
analyzed: thugs ka'i h'um gyi 'phro du las //
translated: From the emanation of hūṃ in the heart

original: khro bo chen po bcu ru gyur //
analyzed: khro bo chen po bcu ru gyur //
translated: it becomes the ten great wrathful ones.

original: h'um bzhi'i gsang sngags brjod pa yis //
analyzed: h'um bzhi'i gsang sngags brjod pa yis //
translated: Reciting the secret mantra of the four hūṃs,🔽the emanations of molten metal summon the vicious ones,

original: khro chu'i sprul bas gdug pa bkug / sku gsung thugs kyi phur pa btab //
analyzed: khro chu'i sprul bas gdug pa bkug / sku gsung thugs kyi phur pa btab //
translated: and they are struck with the kīlas of body, speech, and mind.

original: btul zhing sbyangs nas nam mkhar gyur //
analyzed: btul zhing sbyangs nas nam mkhar gyur //
translated: Having been subdued and refined, they become space.

original: de nas h'um gi 'phro 'du las //
analyzed: de nas h'um gi 'phro 'du las //
translated: Then from the emanation and reabsorption of hūṃ

original: rdo rje'i gur dang ra ba dang // dra ba nyid du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gur dang ra ba dang // dra ba nyid du gyur pa'o //
translated: it becomes a vajra tent, enclosure, and lattice.

original: h'um gi 'phro 'dus slar la zhu //
analyzed: h'um gi 'phro 'dus slar la zhu //
translated: Again melt through the emanation and reabsorption of hūṃ.

original: stong pa nyid las 'od dpung byung //
analyzed: stong pa nyid las 'od dpung byung //
translated: From emptiness, a mass of light arises.

original: de las nyi zla kha sbyar gyur //
analyzed: de las nyi zla kha sbyar gyur //
translated: From that, the sun and moon join.

original: a'a li k'a li nyi zlas brgyan //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li nyi zlas brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the sun and moon of ālikāli,

original: dbus su aa: dang h'um sbyar te //
analyzed: dbus su aa: dang h'um sbyar te //
translated: In the center, unite the a and hūṃ.

original: kha dog dkar dmar nyid du gyur //
analyzed: kha dog dkar dmar nyid du gyur //
translated: They become white and red in color.

original: 'od zer dkar dmar 'phro 'du las //
analyzed: 'od zer dkar dmar 'phro 'du las //
translated: From the white and red light rays radiating and returning,

original: zhu bas rdo rje padmar gyur //
analyzed: zhu bas rdo rje padmar gyur //
translated: They melt and become a vajra and lotus.

original: pad lter rdo rje rked nub tsam //
analyzed: pad lter rdo rje rked nub tsam //
translated: The vajra is at the center of the lotus, just below the navel.

original: lte ba gnyis la snying pos bskor //
analyzed: lte ba gnyis la snying pos bskor //
translated: The two centers are surrounded by the essence.

original: de nyid ngo bo thugs dang @74b gsung ;
analyzed: de nyid ngo bo thugs dang @74b gsung ;
translated: The essence is the mind and speech of the two.

original: / gnyis kas sku gsung byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: / gnyis kas sku gsung byin gyis brlab //
translated: Both consecrate the body and speech.

original: de nyid 'od du zhu ba las //🔽rdo rje las ni khro bor gyur //🔽padma las ni khro mor gyur //
analyzed: de nyid 'od du zhu ba las // rdo rje las ni khro bor gyur // padma las ni khro mor gyur //
translated: That melts into light.🔽From the vajra, it becomes the wrathful one.🔽From the lotus, it becomes the wrathful lady.

original: khro bo rdo rje gos sngon ni //
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje gos sngon ni //
translated: The wrathful blue vajra

original: sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa //
analyzed: sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa //
translated: is blue-black in color with one face.

original: phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
analyzed: phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
translated: He holds a vajra and a bell in his two hands.

original: mche ba gtsigs shing spyan gsum dmar //
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs shing spyan gsum dmar //
translated: He bares his fangs and has three red eyes.

original: ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil //
analyzed: ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil //
translated: His brown hair swirls upward.

original: phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan //
translated: He is endowed with the six symbolic ornaments.

original: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'khril ba'i tshul //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'khril ba'i tshul //
translated: The two feet are in the posture of extended and bent, in union.

original: mdun du rdo rje phag mo ni //
analyzed: mdun du rdo rje phag mo ni //
translated: In front is Vajravarahi,

original: sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig ma //
analyzed: sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig ma //
translated: Red, with one face,

original: g-yas pa rdo rje gri gug bsnams //
analyzed: g-yas pa rdo rje gri gug bsnams //
translated: Holding a vajra and flaying knife with the right hand,

original: g-yon pa bhan dha dmar gyis bkang ;
analyzed: g-yon pa bhan dha dmar gyis bkang ;
translated: And a blood-filled skull cup with the left.

original: / gcer bu spyan gsum dbu skra brdzes //
analyzed: / gcer bu spyan gsum dbu skra brdzes //
translated: Naked, with three eyes, disheveled hair,

original: phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan //
translated: And the six symbolic ornaments,

original: gdan du rdo rje rgya gram bsam //
analyzed: gdan du rdo rje rgya gram bsam //
translated: She is imagined on a vajra cross seat.

original: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa:/
analyzed: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa:/
translated: Om hum tram hrīḥ āḥ

original: ae wam m'a ya /
analyzed: ae wam m'a ya /
translated: E vam mā ya

original: h'um svad hr'i: a'a: dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: h'um svad hr'i: a'a: dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: Hum svā hā hrīḥ āḥ jaḥ hum vaṃ hoḥ

original: aom a'a: h'um sa ma ya stvam /🔽aom a'a: h'um sa ma ya dza:/🔽aom a'a: h'um sa ma ya a'a:/
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um sa ma ya stvam / aom a'a: h'um sa ma ya dza:/ aom a'a: h'um sa ma ya a'a:/
translated: Om āḥ hum samaya stvam🔽Om āḥ hum samaya jaḥ🔽Om āḥ hum samaya āḥ

original: buddha ga ru da aom badzra ga ru da h'um ;
analyzed: buddha ga ru da aom badzra ga ru da h'um ;
translated: Buddhagaruda om

original: ratna ga ru da tr'am /🔽padma ga ru da hr'i:/
analyzed: ratna ga ru da tr'am / padma ga ru da hr'i:/
translated: Ratnagaruda tram🔽Padmagaruda hrīḥ

original: karma ga ru da aa:/🔽ae pushpa ga ru da /
analyzed: karma ga ru da aa:/ ae pushpa ga ru da /
translated: Karmagaruda āḥ🔽E puṣpagaruda

original: wam dh'u pa ga ru da /
analyzed: wam dh'u pa ga ru da /
translated: Vaṃ dhūpagaruda

original: m'a a'a lo ke ga ru da /🔽ya gandha ga ru da /
analyzed: m'a a'a lo ke ga ru da / ya gandha ga ru da /
translated: Mā ālokegaruda🔽Ya gandhaga ru da

original: ga ru da yaksha /🔽ga ru da ya ma /
analyzed: ga ru da yaksha / ga ru da ya ma /
translated: Garudayakṣa🔽Garudayamā

original: ga ru da hu lu /
analyzed: ga ru da hu lu /
translated: Garudahulū

original: ga ru da tstshinda /
analyzed: ga ru da tstshinda /
translated: Garuḍa, break!

original: dza: ga ru da /
analyzed: dza: ga ru da /
translated: Jaḥ garuḍa!

original: h'um ga ru da /🔽bam ga ru da /
analyzed: h'um ga ru da / bam ga ru da /
translated: Hūṃ garuḍa!🔽Vaṃ garuḍa!

original: ho: ga ru da /
analyzed: ho: ga ru da /
translated: Hoḥ garuḍa!

original: yab kyi go cha'o //
analyzed: yab kyi go cha'o //
translated: This is the armor of the father.

original: aom bam / ham yom /
analyzed: aom bam / ham yom /
translated: Oṃ vaṃ / haṃ yoṃ /

original: hrim mom / hrem hrim /
analyzed: hrim mom / hrem hrim /
translated: hriṃ moṃ / hreṃ hreṃ /

original: h'um h'um / phat phat /
analyzed: h'um h'um / phat phat /
translated: hūṃ hūṃ / phaṭ phaṭ.

original: yum gyi go cha'o //
analyzed: yum gyi go cha'o //
translated: This is the armor of the mother.

original: thugs ka'i 'od zer 'phros pa yis //
analyzed: thugs ka'i 'od zer 'phros pa yis //
translated: Light rays radiate from the heart

original: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la //
translated: and invoke the awareness beings.

original: phyi nang bdud rtsi bcas pas mchod //
analyzed: phyi nang bdud rtsi bcas pas mchod //
translated: Offer the outer and inner elixir.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: bcas pas bcing //
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: bcas pas bcing //
translated: Jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ—they are bound.

original: bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur bas rigs kyi gtso bos dbu brgyan bsam //
analyzed: bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur bas rigs kyi gtso bos dbu brgyan bsam //
translated: The empowerment is conferred with the vase of elixir, and one imagines that the principal one of the family adorns one’s head.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: thig le ge sar bcas pa'i dbus //
analyzed: thig le ge sar bcas pa'i dbus //
translated: In the center of the bindu with the arousing,

original: a'a li k'a li yang dag ldan //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li yang dag ldan //
translated: the ālikāli is perfectly complete.

original: de yi dbus na gnas pa'i lha //
analyzed: de yi dbus na gnas pa'i lha //
translated: In the center of that is the deity,

original: dar dkar phra ba'i skud pa tsam //
analyzed: dar dkar phra ba'i skud pa tsam //
translated: the size of a fine thread of white silk.

original: de las bsam gyis mi khyab bsam //
analyzed: de las bsam gyis mi khyab bsam //
translated: From that, imagine the inconceivable.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams nas //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams nas //
translated: Having imagined the inconceivable,

original: de las gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'gyur //
analyzed: de las gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'gyur //
translated: the two rūpakāyas arise from that.

original: dang po rnal 'byor lung gis brgyan //
analyzed: dang po rnal 'byor lung gis brgyan //
translated: First, the yoga is adorned with the transmission.

original: de nas chos kyi dbyings su thim //🔽phag mo'i de kho na nyid ni //
analyzed: de nas chos kyi dbyings su thim // phag mo'i de kho na nyid ni //
translated: Then, it dissolves into the dharmadhatu.🔽The reality of Varahi:

original: phag zhal don dam dngos po med //
analyzed: phag zhal don dam dngos po med //
translated: The pig face is the ultimate, non-entity.

original: kun rdzogs khro zhal mtshon pa la //
analyzed: kun rdzogs khro zhal mtshon pa la //
translated: The complete wrathful face is the symbol.

original: bya ni gsal ba'i thabs yin te //
analyzed: bya ni gsal ba'i thabs yin te //
translated: The bird is the method of clarity.

original: khyung ni gsal ba dngos med yin//
analyzed: khyung ni gsal ba dngos med yin//
translated: The garuda is clarity without entity.

original: @75a * // ga ni gang du mi gnas te //
analyzed: @75a * // ga ni gang du mi gnas te //
translated: Ga is not abiding anywhere.

original: ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid //
analyzed: ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid //
translated: Ru is being free from accumulation.

original: bya ni gzugs sku rnam gnyis te //
analyzed: bya ni gzugs sku rnam gnyis te //
translated: The bird is the two kinds of rupakaya.

original: khyung ni rang bzhin 'od gsal bas //
analyzed: khyung ni rang bzhin 'od gsal bas //
translated: The garuda is the naturally luminous nature.

original: gdong nas dag pas nam mkha' bzhin //
analyzed: gdong nas dag pas nam mkha' bzhin //
translated: Since it is pure from the beginning, it is like the sky.

original: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa //
analyzed: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa //
translated: One's own mind is primordially unborn.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of emptiness.

original: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um /
translated: Om vajra chanad maharoshana hum

original: badzra ga ru da h'um h'um phat phat /🔽m'a ra m'a ra ya /
analyzed: badzra ga ru da h'um h'um phat phat / m'a ra m'a ra ya /
translated: Vajra garuda hum hum phat phat🔽Mara mara ya

original: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
analyzed: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
translated: Spotaya spotaya

original: badzra p'a ni ga ru da be ga h'um h'um dza: dza: ra tse pre tsi h'um phat /
analyzed: badzra p'a ni ga ru da be ga h'um h'um dza: dza: ra tse pre tsi h'um phat /
translated: Vajra pani garuda vega hum hum dzra dzra rtsa pre tsi hum phat

original: aom badzra d'a ki n'i h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra d'a ki n'i h'um h'um phat /
translated: Om vajra dakini hum hum phat

original: yum gyi snying po'o //
analyzed: yum gyi snying po'o //
translated: This is the essence of the mother.

original: dza: h'um dar ma sham ga ki ni da ri /
analyzed: dza: h'um dar ma sham ga ki ni da ri /
translated: Jom, hum, Dar ma shag, Ki ni da ri,

original: dar ma he sha dhu dhu ra /
analyzed: dar ma he sha dhu dhu ra /
translated: Dar ma he sha, Dhu dhu ra,

original: ratna te sham ka ri /🔽dar ma ti sha tsa ka ra /
analyzed: ratna te sham ka ri / dar ma ti sha tsa ka ra /
translated: Ratna te sha, Kam kari,🔽 Dar ma ti sha, Cha kari,

original: dar ma te sha sa ma ya /
analyzed: dar ma te sha sa ma ya /
translated: Dar ma te sha, Sa ma ya,

original: spu ta ya spu ta ya /🔽te pa te pa kha kha ram /
analyzed: spu ta ya spu ta ya / te pa te pa kha kha ram /
translated: Pu ta ya, Pu ta ya,🔽 Te pa te pa, Kha kha ram,

original: te pa te pa tsa ka ri //
analyzed: te pa te pa tsa ka ri //
translated: Te pa te pa, Cha kari,

original: te pa te pa mun du ri /
analyzed: te pa te pa mun du ri /
translated: Te pa te pa, Mun du ri,

original: te pa te pa brbuddho ta ra /
analyzed: te pa te pa brbuddho ta ra /
translated: Te pa te pa, Bar buddho ta ra,

original: te pa te pa sa mu sa munydza /
analyzed: te pa te pa sa mu sa munydza /
translated: Te pa te pa, Sa mu sa mu nya ja,

original: tsa kha mun dur khye /
analyzed: tsa kha mun dur khye /
translated: Cha kha mu n du ra khyai,

original: badzra tsan ran dzad dzad: badzra tsa mundha ra dza: badzra kha mundha ra dza:/
analyzed: badzra tsan ran dzad dzad: badzra tsa mundha ra dza: badzra kha mundha ra dza:/
translated: Vajra cha n ra dzad dzad, Vajra cha mun dha ra dzah, Vajra kha mun dha ra dzah,

original: te sha mun du ra nam /
analyzed: te sha mun du ra nam /
translated: Te sha mun du ra nam,

original: dzu ru dzu ru ram /
analyzed: dzu ru dzu ru ram /
translated: Ju ru ju ru ram,

original: dzu ru dzu ru mun badzra /🔽dza: h'um rdo rje ka chen bskyod /
analyzed: dzu ru dzu ru mun badzra / dza: h'um rdo rje ka chen bskyod /
translated: Ju ru ju ru mun vajra,🔽 Jom, hum, Great vajra, Move,

original: rdo rje drag po bskyod //🔽rdo rje mtha' yas bskyod /
analyzed: rdo rje drag po bskyod // rdo rje mtha' yas bskyod /
translated: Vajra, Fierce, Move,🔽 Vajra, Infinite, Move,

original: rdo rje mthar thug bskyod /
analyzed: rdo rje mthar thug bskyod /
translated: Vajra, Ultimate, Move,

original: kha dza ra dza mun dur khye /
analyzed: kha dza ra dza mun dur khye /
translated: Kha ja ra ja mu n du ra khyai,

original: padma ran kha dza ra dza mun dur khye /
analyzed: padma ran kha dza ra dza mun dur khye /
translated: Padma ran kha ja ra ja mu n du ra khyai,

original: kha dza ra dza mun du ra ra sa munydza /
analyzed: kha dza ra dza mun du ra ra sa munydza /
translated: Kha ja ra ja mu n du ra ra sa mu nya ja,🔽

original: aom d'a ki n'i dza: spyan drangs pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom d'a ki n'i dza: spyan drangs pa'i sngags so //
translated: Oṃ dakini jaḥ. The mantra for inviting.

original: aom k'a ya b'a ka tsitta /
analyzed: aom k'a ya b'a ka tsitta /
translated: Oṃ kāya vāk citta.

original: ai dam ba lim bhunydza dza ka la phulla dh'u pa m'a sa /
analyzed: ai dam ba lim bhunydza dza ka la phulla dh'u pa m'a sa /
translated: Idam baliṃ bhuñja jaka kula phulla dhūpa māsa.

original: se sa kha na di /
analyzed: se sa kha na di /
translated: Sesa khaṇḍi.

original: te ka ka to /
analyzed: te ka ka to /
translated: Te kata.

original: aom aa mri ta pa ti dza: ka sa ka ru /
analyzed: aom aa mri ta pa ti dza: ka sa ka ru /
translated: Oṃ amṛta patidzaḥ kara kuru.

original: p'u dza kh'a hi pushpa /
analyzed: p'u dza kh'a hi pushpa /
translated: Pūja khāhi puṣpa.

original: a'a lo ke / gndhe /
analyzed: a'a lo ke / gndhe /
translated: Āloke.🔽Gandhe.

original: nee be dya /
analyzed: nee be dya /
translated: Naivedya.

original: ka sa ka ru p'u dza kh'a hi n'a ga pu aa dhi pa ti /
analyzed: ka sa ka ru p'u dza kh'a hi n'a ga pu aa dhi pa ti /
translated: Kara kuru pūja khāhi nāga pū ādhīpati.

original: ka sa ka ru p'u dza kh'a hi /🔽aom a'a: h'um /
analyzed: ka sa ka ru p'u dza kh'a hi / aom a'a: h'um /
translated: Kara kuru pūja khāhi.🔽Oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: aa k'a h'um /
analyzed: aa k'a h'um /
translated: Akā hūṃ.

original: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rmm'a n'am /
analyzed: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rmm'a n'am /
translated: Akāra mukham sarva dharmāṇām.

original: a'a dya nutpanna t'va ta aom a'a: h'um /
analyzed: a'a dya nutpanna t'va ta aom a'a: h'um /
translated: Ādyanutpannatāva tvā oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: gtor ma bstabs pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: gtor ma bstabs pa'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra for offering the bali.

original: ka ka raksha /
analyzed: ka ka raksha /
translated: Kakarakṣa.

original: h'um h'um styom bhyom dza:dza:/
analyzed: h'um h'um styom bhyom dza:dza:/
translated: Hūṃ hūṃ styom bhyoṃ jaḥ jaḥ.

original: kha kha te sha raksha /
analyzed: kha kha te sha raksha /
translated: Kha kha teśa rakṣa.

original: h'umh'umstyom bhyom dza:/ kha kha kha tsa ba raksha /
analyzed: h'umh'umstyom bhyom dza:/ kha kha kha tsa ba raksha /
translated: Hūṃ hūṃ styom bhyoṃ jaḥ.🔽Kha kha kha ca vara rakṣa.

original: h'um h'um styom bhyom dza:/
analyzed: h'um h'um styom bhyom dza:/
translated: Hūṃ hūṃ styom bhyoṃ jaḥ.

original: kha kha kha tsa kha raksha /
analyzed: kha kha kha tsa kha raksha /
translated: Kha kha kha ca kha rakṣa.

original: h'um h'um styom bhyom dza:/
analyzed: h'um h'um styom bhyom dza:/
translated: Hūṃ hūṃ styom bhyoṃ jaḥ.

original: kha kha kha mu du raksha /
analyzed: kha kha kha mu du raksha /

original: h'um h'um styom bhyom dza:/
analyzed: h'um h'um styom bhyom dza:/
translated: Hum hum styom bhyom jvam.

original: kha kha kha /
analyzed: kha kha kha /
translated: Khakha kham.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: gdon phyag rgyas dgug pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: gdon phyag rgyas dgug pa'i sngags so //
translated: Jvam hum bam hoḥ. The mantra for summoning the demons with the mudrā.

original: ka ka raksha sa ma ya /🔽spu ta ya /
analyzed: ka ka raksha sa ma ya / spu ta ya /
translated: Kakaraksha samaya.🔽Putta ya.

original: spu dha ra /
analyzed: spu dha ra /
translated: Putta ra.

original: tsa ga raksha sa ma ya /
analyzed: tsa ga raksha sa ma ya /
translated: Chagaraksha samaya.

original: du ta ya sad ta ra /
analyzed: du ta ya sad ta ra /
translated: Dutta ya satta ra.

original: mu du raksha sas ma ya /
analyzed: mu du raksha sas ma ya /
translated: Mudruksha samaya.

original: spu ta ya spu ta ra gdon gshed ma dang 'bral ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: spu ta ya spu ta ra gdon gshed ma dang 'bral ba'i sngags so //
translated: Putta ya putta ra. The mantra for separating the demons from their executioners.

original: h'um hril hril dim dim kun phob phob shar shar di ri di ri rbad /
analyzed: h'um hril hril dim dim kun phob phob shar shar di ri di ri rbad /
translated: Hum hril hril dim dim kun phob phob shar shar di ri di ri rbad.

original: kha tham tham thum /
analyzed: kha tham tham thum /

analyzed: dza re dza re bhyo @75b ha sa ha sa / te pa te pa /

original: tri ta ha tri ta ha /
analyzed: tri ta ha tri ta ha /

analyzed: tri khug tri khug / tshul pa tshal pa / srog tshig nan rbad /

original: lus rdul m'a ra ya rbad /
analyzed: lus rdul m'a ra ya rbad /

original: ram ram dza la dza la /
analyzed: ram ram dza la dza la /

original: shig shig rdul bun rbad sod /
analyzed: shig shig rdul bun rbad sod /

original: n'a ga sarba ga ru da kh'a hi /
analyzed: n'a ga sarba ga ru da kh'a hi /

original: spyi dril ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: spyi dril ba'i sngags so //
translated: The general summary mantra.

original: aom na mo bu ddh'a ya /
analyzed: aom na mo bu ddh'a ya /

original: k'i li mi li tsanta na ga bandha ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: k'i li mi li tsanta na ga bandha ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Kali mili candana bandhaya svāhā.

original: phur pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: phur pa'i sngags so //

original: ra li hur hur thum bhyo dha sha hur thum bhyo /
analyzed: ra li hur hur thum bhyo dha sha hur thum bhyo /
translated: Rali hur hur thum bhyo dhasa hur thum bhyo.

original: ma ma shi bhyo /
analyzed: ma ma shi bhyo /
translated: Mama śibhyo.

original: sarba ga ru ser ba la bhyo /
analyzed: sarba ga ru ser ba la bhyo /
translated: Sarva garu serba la bhyo.

original: ser ba bzlog pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: ser ba bzlog pa'i sngags so //

original: aom be ra be ra badzra dha ri ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom be ra be ra badzra dha ri ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vera vera vajradharīye svāhā.

original: rims nad bsrung ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: rims nad bsrung ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra for protecting against contagious diseases.

original: h'um di ri di ri ga ru da bhyo h'um dza: dza:/
analyzed: h'um di ri di ri ga ru da bhyo h'um dza: dza:/
translated: Hum dhiri dhiri garuda bhyo hum jaḥ jaḥ.

original: ae aa ri li hri bhyo /
analyzed: ae aa ri li hri bhyo /
translated: E arili hri bhyo.

original: 'khor gyi klu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: 'khor gyi klu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so //

original: h'um dzu ti ting ting teg teg teg ho ho /
analyzed: h'um dzu ti ting ting teg teg teg ho ho /
translated: Hum juti ting ting tek tek tek ho ho.

original: h'um sto bhyo /
analyzed: h'um sto bhyo /
translated: Hum stobha bhyo.

original: gtad 'don pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: gtad 'don pa'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra for exorcising spirits.

original: tri nam m'a ra ya h'um phat /
analyzed: tri nam m'a ra ya h'um phat /
translated: Tri namāraya hum phat.

original: 'byung po skrod pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: 'byung po skrod pa'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra for expelling bhūtas.

original: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas //
analyzed: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas //
translated: By composing this sādhana,

original: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
analyzed: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
translated: May I and all infinite sentient beings,

original: 'di la brten pa'i rnal 'byor rnams //
analyzed: 'di la brten pa'i rnal 'byor rnams //
translated: The yogins who rely on this,

original: phyag rgya chen po thob par shog / rdo rje skor gyi nang sgrub yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po thob par shog / rdo rje skor gyi nang sgrub yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba /
translated: The Wish-Fulfilling Jewel: An Inner Sadhana of Vajrapāṇi

original: phyag na rdo rje zhal mngon sum du gzigs pa slob dpon las kyi rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje zhal mngon sum du gzigs pa slob dpon las kyi rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The work of Master Karmavajra, who had a direct vision of Vajrapāṇi, is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsantra dang / lo ts'a ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
